title: Batman: Batman and Son. The Black Glove. Deluxe edition
description: An alternate cover for this ISBN can be found here.From the inspired minds of comics guru Grant Morrison (ACTION COMICS, ALL-STAR SUPERMAN) and artists Andy Kubert (FLASHPOINT), J.H. Williams III (BATWOMAN) and Tony S. Daniel (DETECTIVE COMICS) comes an astonishing tale of Batman's darkest hours.Collects BATMAN #655-658, #663-669, #672-675, which includes issue #666 - a futuristic glimpse of Damian Wayne as the new Dark Knight!
author: Grant Morrison
